Hi everyone,
I'm trying to make an exact copy of a CrawlURI to do a bunch o=
f extra processes without messing up the original. However, there is no cop=
y constructor and cloning doesn't really work. I tried writing my own copy =
constructor, but it keeps throwing a bunch of exceptions no matter what I t=
ry. Is there a better way to copy a CrawlURI that someone would recommend? =
Or maybe someone has a working copy Constructor? Any help would be greatly =
appreciated. Thanks :)
